isis.stitle: Procedural Guideline - POWER STEERING PUMP (V-8), REPLACE

step1.para: Remove charge air cooler hoses and pipes for access to the pump.
On high pressure lube oil reservoir, remove 1/4 in. pipe plug. Extract oil using hand operated vacuum pump.
Disconnect power steering hoses from pump. Cap ends.
Remove nuts retaining power steering pump to high pressure lube oil reservoir.
Note angle of fittings for installation. Remove fittings.
Install pump fittings at correct angle.
Install new O-ring onto pump. Install pump to high pressure lube oil reservoir. Torque nuts to specification.
Connect power steering hoses to pump.
Fill high pressure lube oil reservoir with clean engine oil. Install pipe plug.
Install charge air cooler hoses and pipes.
Bleed power steering system as follows: fill the power steering reservoir to the indicated level and install cap.
Start engine and idle, turning wheels full left and full right three times. Shut off engine and refill to correct level.
Continue operation in Step 7 until correct level is obtained.
Run engine at faster rpm and continue to turn wheels back and forth slowly for approximately 5 minutes. Refill reservoir to correct level.
